scripts.build: npm run build-mixins && npm run build-higher-order && npm run build-wrappers && npm run build-decorators
scripts.build-higher-order: mkdir -p build && browserify -x baobab -x react -t babelify ./src/higher-order.js -o build/higher-order.js
scripts.build-wrappers: mkdir -p build && browserify -x baobab -x react/addons -t babelify ./src/wrappers.js -o build/wrappers.js
scripts.build-decorators: mkdir -p build && browserify -x baobab -x react -t babelify ./src/decorators.js -o build/decorators.js
